question: Writing task 1: Write atleast 150 words and spend no more than 20minutes on this task.You are new to the city and you would like to take your family out for a meal.Write a letter to your friend who is familiar with the city. In your letter:• Tell him or her about the occasion• Tell him or her about what kind of a restaurant you prefer• Ask him suitable recommendations
text: It's indeed nice to write to you after a long time and I hope you are doing well. As I told you, we have moved to Bangalore last month to join the new company. I am starting to enjoy the work and weather here. However, I haven't started exploring the city yet. With my parent's anniversary arriving in another two days, I would need your advice on finding the perfect restaurant for a celebration.

They are usually fond of traditional cuisines, especially non-veg food of Chettinad style. It will be a real surprise for them to get such food in Bangalore. I am also planning to make them exchange rings to remember their wedding day, in a serene place with a beautiful garden. Doesn't it sound perfect and dreamy? I am so excited.

I have a vague memory of you letting me know about one such restaurant, where even the entire hotel had this traditional atmosphere and food being wonderful. Could you please write me the choices available here? I will make the reservations right away upon your response.
I know you will act immediately, you are such a charmer.
